name: Ben Carlsson
body:
# Hello.
My name is **Ben Carlsson**. I'm 22 years old and I'm currently a student at [California State University, Chico][1]. I'm majoring in Computer Science, and I'm a gamer in my free time. I dislike not only long walks and beaches, but also situations in which the former takes place on the latter.

*Things I'm very experienced at* include PHP, HTML/CSS, Linux, and correcting your written English (but I admit that last one is sometimes more obsession than skill).

*Things I'm pretty good at* include Java, C/C++, and relational databases.

*Things I'm okay at* include web design, Python, and coming up with lists of things I'm okay at.

[1]: http://csuchico.edu/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
